sentences.en: B . Approximately 8 percent of all cases of cancer are hereditary.
sentences.cn: 所有乳腺癌病例中大约有8%是遗传性的.

sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal hereditary disease.
sentences.cn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命性遗传疾病。

sentences.en: Doctor:  I can do nothing for your complaint. It is hereditary.
sentences.cn: 医生: “对你的抱怨我无能为力.那是遗传病. ”

sentences.en: Does dominance hereditary disease have those ? Recessive have those again ?
sentences.cn: 像红绿色盲, 白化病,血友病都是隐性遗传病,六指就是显性的.

sentences.en: Genetic engineers transpose or exchange bits of hereditary material from one organism to the next.
sentences.cn: 遗传工程师将某一生物的小段遗传物质调换到另一生物，或与其互换。

sentences.en: He argued that organisms evolve gradually by accumulating small hereditary changes.
sentences.cn: 他论证说,生物是由于一些小的遗传变异的积累而逐渐演变的.

sentences.en: He too had this hereditary peculiarity.
sentences.cn: 他也有这种祖传的特殊姿态.

sentences.en: In men, hair loss is hereditary.
It is known that they are strands of deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) , the hereditary material of the cell.
sentences.cn: 已知它们为 脱氧核糖核酸 链, 是细胞的遗传物质.

sentences.en: It passes on the hereditary material to each daughter cell.
sentences.cn: 它将遗传物质传至每个子细胞.

sentences.en: Succession in control of such an enterprise as the Family was by no means hereditary.
sentences.cn: 像家族那样的企业控制权,按惯例,根本不是父子相传的.

sentences.en: Suitable for: people with simple obesity, post - natal fatness, hereditary obesity, middleageoverweight.
sentences.cn: 相宜人群: 单纯性肥胖 、 产后肥胖 、 遗传性肥胖 、 中年性肥胖等人群.

sentences.en: The tendency to become obese is at least in part hereditary.
sentences.cn: 发胖至少有一部分是源于遗传。

sentences.en: There was such a world of hereditary quiet in her.
sentences.cn: 她身上有一种先天的娴静气质.

sentences.en: Where power has been exercised over generations, a kind of hereditary incorruptibility grows up.
sentences.cn: 有的连续几代人握有实权,但仍相继保持某种廉洁之风.

words.tran_cn: 世袭财产，可继承的财产

trans.tran_cn: （生物学中）遗传的，世袭的，遗传性
trans.tran_en: a quality or illness that is hereditary is passed from a parent to a child before the child is born
